00009 LinkInfo::LinkInfo(NodeInfo *node, EdgeInfo *egde) {
00010 
00011         if(node == NULL) {
00012                 throw std::invalid_argument("Link node is null");
00013         }
00014         if(edge == NULL) {
00015                 throw std::invalid_argument("Link edge is null");

00032 bool LinkInfo::operator < (LinkInfo const & link) const {
